attributes.action: Level the minimum wage for ALL and stop ripping off 16 and 17 year olds, as well as everyone under 22!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The minimum wage stands as follows:

£3.30 for 16 and 17 year olds.

£4.45 for 18- 21 year olds.

£5.35 for 22 and over.

How is this fair?

Those doing the same job deserve to be paid the same. Just as sexist discrimination is wrong, so is ageism. The government must stop ripping off our youth and show support for their contributions to society. Their current policy, especially as it was made to encourage youngsters to remain in education, is unjust and unfair. They are condoning exploitation, and it is completely unacceptable. Please sign this petition to urge our government to raise the pitiful minimum wage of those under 22 and show your support against ageist discrimination.
